CustomField.description: Unit Margin in Cubic Meters entered in Opportunity currency
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Local marketing margin is all and everything you get from the customer - above the price you get from Trading. Enter fractions using your normal decimal separator e.g. Unit Margin is half a Euro Cent and your decimal separator is a comma then enter 0,005
CustomField.label: Unit Margin (opp cur/M3)
